backupModal.title: Your recovery phrase not saved!
backupModal.description:
Recovery phrase (Seed phrase) is the only key to your assets! In case of failure or loss of a mobile device, it will be impossible to restore access to your assets without Seed-phrase!

Save your Recovery phrase in a safe place now!

Beware of scammers, never give your Recovery phrase to anyone!

cashback.pageSubtitle: Earn to 30% from the commission with Trustee Wallet!
cashback.cashbackMessage: Get Cashback for your exchange transactions. Earn Crypto with Affiliate Program and CPA by recommending Trustee Wallet!

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.info1Title: Does Trustee Wallet have a user rewards program?
howItWorks.info1Content: The program consists of cashback and a two-tier affiliate program, which ultimately allows you to receive up to 30% of Trustee commissions for purchases and sales of cryptocurrencies by invited users
howItWorks.info2Content: To activate, you need to invite one new user using your cashback link. After activation, you will receive 10% of the Trustee's commission from your exchanges. This feature is activated forever!
howItWorks.info3Title: What are the conditions of the affiliate program?
howItWorks.info3Content: Level 1 – 10% of the Trustee commission for purchases and sales of cryptocurrencies by invited users (activated from the first partner). The more friends install the wallet using your link, the more your income will be. Level 2 - activated when the structure's turnover exceeds 5000 USDT per week and will allow you to receive 10% of Trustee commissions from 2nd level users (partners of your partners).
howItWorks.info4Title: How to withdraw cashback and affiliate rewards?
howItWorks.info4Content: The minimum withdrawal amount is 2 USDT
howItWorks.info5Title: Who can access the CPA program?
howItWorks.info5Content: We value each user and are happy to reward them for effective actions to popularize Trustee Wallet. Each Trustee user automatically becomes a member of the CPA program.
howItWorks.info6Title: How does the CPA program work?
howItWorks.info6Content: For each new active installation of the application using your cashback link (when the invited user has made at least one purchase of cryptocurrencies from any bank card), the program participant receives a one-time reward.
howItWorks.info7Title: What are the awards for the CPA program?
howItWorks.info7Content:
Level 1
The first purchase is up to $100. Reward - $2

Level 2
The amount of the first purchase is $100-$500. Reward - $5

Level 3
The first purchase is over $500. Reward - $10
howItWorks.info8Title: How can invite users to Trustee?
howItWorks.info8Content: Recommend Trustee Wallet to your friends and colleagues using your cashback link. You can use all types of traffic for inviting users: Contextual advertising, Email-mailing, advertising in social networks, Teaser networks, YouTube channels. More information on the link.
howItWorks.info9Title: How can I withdraw CPA rewards?
howItWorks.info9Content: The minimum withdrawal amount is 100 USDT

cashback.mainDescription: Invite your friend and start earning 10% cashback from the commission of your exchanges! Trustee returns up to 30% commission to its users!

infoModal.title: Info
infoModal.BNB: BNB Memo is an arbitrary and optional transaction attachment
infoModal.XRP: A destination tag is a unique 9-digit figure assigned to each Ripple (XRP) account. It is used to identify the receiver in a Ripple transaction.
infoModal.XMR: Payment ID is an arbitrary and optional transaction attachment. The Payment ID is usually used to identify transactions to merchants and exchanges: Given the intrinsic privacy features built into Monero, where a single public address is usually used for incoming transactions, the Payment ID is especially useful to tie incoming payments with user accounts.
infoModal.XLM: Stellar Memo is an arbitrary and optional transaction attachment

confirmModal.title: Do you confirm sending?
confirmModal.titleSpeedUp: Do you confirm speeding up incoming transaction %{hash}?

feeModal.description:
The network fee it is the payment that miners receive for confirming your transaction. The network fee (miners) is paid by the sender for the transfer of crypto assets to the recipient's address. This fee does not depend on the transfer amount and is calculated based on the network data at the time of the transaction creation.

Important!
 The speed of confirmation of your transaction by miners directly depends on the size of the network fee. Please consider this information when manually changing the commission.

errors.UI_CONFIRM_DOUBLE_SEND: The transaction has been sent to this address already, are you sure that you want to repeat the transaction?
errors.UI_CONFIRM_DOUBLE_BSE_SEND: The transaction has been sent to order already, are you sure that you want to create new transaction?
errors.UI_CONFIRM_ADDRESS_TO_EMPTY_BALANCE: This address has no funds. Are you sure it's correct?
errors.UI_CALCULATE_CUSTOM_FEE: Please, calculate actual custom fee to use for send
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_CONTRACT_DESTINATION_INV: Please, check the recipient's address. Sending transactions directly to the smart contract address is not possible
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_CLOUDFLARE: Please, try again - no access to cloudflare protected server
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_BAD_CODE: Something went wrong, contact our support service, please,
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_BAD_TX_TO_REPLACE: Transaction was not found, please check your internet connection. Possible delays for updating information
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_FEE: Insufficient balance of native currency %{symbol} to pay the network fee
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_FEE_JUST_DUST: Your wallet has accumulated many incoming transactions with small amounts. Please use the "Send All" button to send the transaction correctly
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_FEE_OR_BAD_IN: Native currency (%{symbol}) balance cannot be updated. Please check your internet connection
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOTHING_TO_TRANSFER: Insufficient balance to send the transaction
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOTHING_TO_TRANSFER_FROM: Balance of your %{symbol} wallet is less then sending amount. Please rescan balance of %{symbol} and try again.
errors.UI_CORRECTED_AMOUNT: Balance of your %{symbol} wallet is different then sending amount, please confirm sending %{amount} %{symbol}
errors.UI_CORRECTED_AMOUNT_BSE: The balance of your %{symbol} wallet is less than the amount to be sent. Please, update your %{symbol} balance and repeat the swap operation.
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOTHING_LEFT_FOR_FEE: Insufficient balance to pay the network fee - please use an option "Send All"
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOTHING_LEFT_FOR_DELEGAT: Insufficient balance to pay the delegated transaction - please use ERC20 standard transaction
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_RESPONSE: The transaction has not received a network confirmation - please wait for the other transactions to be mined
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_RESPONSE_XMR: Under the terms of the Monero protocol, each incoming transaction must collect at least 50 network confirmations (~1.5 hours) before being sent. Please wait until the last incoming transaction reaches 50 network confirmations and retry sending.
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_RESPONSE_OR_MORE_FEE: The transaction has not received a network confirmation - please wait for the other transactions to be mined or place higher fee
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_CONFIRMED_FEE: Insufficient balance of native currency %{symbol} to pay the network fee - please wait for the other transactions to be mined
errors.UI_CONFIRM_CHANGE_AMOUNT_FOR_REPLACEMENT: Insufficient balance of native currency %{symbol} to pay - click yes, to take some fee from the recipient's amount, then in the next step you will see the recalculated transaction data
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_AMOUNT_AS_FEE: Transaction replacement fee is too small
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_REVERTED_BY_EVM: Transaction reverted by EVM - please check contract code
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_CONNECTED: There is no connection to a node in the network. Please change your internet connection or use a VPN while using the app
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_AMOUNT_FOR_AN: Insufficient balance to make the transaction and to pay the minimal fee
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_WAIT_FOR_CONFIRM: Please wait for the other transactions to be mined or turn ON an option "Use unconfirmed transactions"
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_TOO_BIG_FEE_FOR_TRANSACT: Transaction fee is too high - please adjust the fee manually or send more funds
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_TOO_BIG_FEE_PER_BYTE_FOR: Transaction fee per byte is too high - please adjust the fee manually
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_SELF_TX_FORBIDDEN: Transactions to the same address are forbidden
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_BALANCE_XRP: Insufficient balance to make the transaction (Please keep not less than 10 XRP on balance)
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_BALANCE_DEST_: Insufficient funds - send not less than 10 XRP to activate the receiving address
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_TAG_NEEDED_XRP: Destination Tag is incorrect - please enter the correct Destination Tag to make the transaction
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_LEGACY_BALANCE_NEEDED_US: Insufficient BTC balance on linked USDT address - please wait or turn ON an option "Use unconfirmed transactions"
Insufficient or unconfirmed BTC balance on linked USDT address - please wait or turn ON an option "Use unconfirmed transactions"
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_RESPONSE_UAX_USE_ETH: The transaction has not received a network confirmation - please wait for the other transactions to be mined or use ERC20 standard transaction
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NO_SSL: SSL library was not found - please update the system
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_PLEASE_SELECT_FEE: Please, select the available fee from the list
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_TOO_MUCH_GAS_ETH: Transfer requires too much gas - please check destination address if it is smart contract
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_TOO_MUCH_GAS_ETH_ERC20: Token transfer requires too much gas - please check smart contract as your balance could be locked
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_BAD_SEND_NODE: No access to sending server or internet error - please try again
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_DOUBLE_SPEND: Please, regenerate transaction as outputs are changed or wait for the other transactions to be mined
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_BANDWITH_ERROR_TRX: The Bandwidth (BW) of your address is not enough to complete a tx. Wait a day to replenish the BW or receive 1-2 TRX to the wallet address to compensate the BW.
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_ENERGY_ERROR_VET: Insufficient VeChain Thor Token (VTHO) balance for fee
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_PLEASE_CHECK_SYSTEM_TIME: Please check your phone system time - it need to be synchronized for correct transaction creation
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_BALANCE_SOL: Insufficient balance to make the transaction
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_NOT_ENOUGH_AMOUNT_STAKE_: Insufficient amount to stake in the transaction
errors.SERVER_RESPONSE_RECEIVER_EMPTY_BALANCE: The recipient's address is empty. Cannot send tokens to address with zero SOL balance in the Solana blockchain

infoScreen.text1: TRUSTEE WALLET never sends your recovery phrase anywhere. Therefore, in case of device loss or failure, the only way to restore access to your funds is to use a recovery phrase.
infoScreen.checkbox1: I understand that I am fully responsible for the safety of the Recovery Phrase and in the event of its loss or transfer to third parties, I will lose my funds without the possibility of recovery.
infoScreen.checkbox2: I understand that I must view my recovery phrase in private with no cameras and eyes around
infoScreen.text2: Be very careful with recovery phrase - anyone with it can access or spend your funds. Please, do not tell the recovery phrase under any circumstances!

step0Screen.info: The Recovery Phrase (mnemonic phrase, seed-phrase) is the secret access key to all balances in your wallet. Write it down, observing the word order, save it securely and do not pass it on to anyone!
step0Screen.showButton: Press and hold here to see the phrase
step0Screen.showQrButton: Press and hold here to see the QR-code
step0Screen.showQR: Get QR-code for import to another device
step0Screen.infoQR: QR-code reveals recovery phrase. Please dont send it to other people and dont store in gallery!

step1Screen.title: Check
step1Screen.placeholder:
Enter the words in the correct order to confirm the Recovery Phrase.
Tap on a word if you want to remove it from the field
step1Screen.showButton: Press and hold here to see the phrase

secondStep.description: Let`s verify your recovery phrase. Please, tap each word in the correct order. To delete word from field tap on it again.

walletCreate.title: Beware of scammers!
walletCreate.description:
Do not use wallets that you found on the Internet, that you were given or sold. With a high probability, you will lose funds that you will transfer to the addresses of such wallets.

Use only those wallets that you personally generated!
